content:
Hey, at the moment i try to learn profiling with forge, but every profil get the same validation error at simplifier after uploading by forge. I tried various own profils, but its every time the same error.

Error Code: 4000
Incomplete : Resolution of profile at 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/StructureDefinition' failed: Type checking the data: Encountered unknown element 'isModifierReason' at location 'StructureDefinition.snapshot[0].element[3].isModifierReason[0]' while parsing

Does someone know this issue?
Please help :)
Do you have a link, so we can take a look?
I always get these types of errors when I accidentally try to upload STU3 profiles to R4 projects, or vice versa. Maybe you're doing that too?

The project and the profil are both STU3.
But the error vanished as i deleted the old project and tried it once again. Really strange, but thanks for your help :)
